org.lindbergframework.persistence.context
Class LinpContext

java.lang.Object
  org.lindbergframework.persistence.context.LinpContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
Configuration, ComponentContext<LinpContext,LinpConfiguration>, LinpConfiguration
public class LinpContext
extends Object
implements ComponentContext<LinpContext,LinpConfiguration>, LinpConfiguration

Context implementation for lindberg persistence. This context provides the resources referring to persistence configurations and is used throughout the persistence module. This context implementation is a singleton.

Author:
Victor Lindberg
